content.text: Hey man, how's your day going?
It's going great! I just finished a long run and I'm excited to see my girlfriend.
That's awesome! I love long runs. What's your favorite music to listen to while you run?
I love listening to folk music. It's so relaxing and it helps me get into a rhythm.
I like folk music too! I love how it's so authentic and down-to-earth.
Right? It's so much better than all the mainstream pop music out there.
I agree. I feel like it's more genuine and honest.
Yeah, and it's so much more creative.
Have you ever been to a folk music festival?
I have! I went to one a few years ago and it was amazing.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to go to one.
You should! It's a great experience.
I will definitely check it out.
